changes: Added prop building blocks for building standardized props for components
Added reusable atoms for building components
Added hook useWebComponentState that can be used to control state and trigger events for props on webcomponent.
The hook useConnectedOverlay now supports aligning items on the inside of the trigger element.
The useFocusTrap is now a proper hook that returns a toggle for enabling/disabling focus trap.
fixes: Instead of calling the useFocusTrap each time you enable/disable the focus trap, you use the returned method.

changes: Added a new hook useIsOverflowing.
Missing dependency to tslib.
Fixed the SSR check in the function warnDeprecatedProps.
Hook useBreakpoints to check for breakpoints through code.
Fixed a bug that caused the useFocusTrap hook to not work properly when a custom element was passed as content in the elvia-modal component.
Remove function throttle, as it is only a re-export of lodash.throttle
fixes: Add lodash.throttle as a dependency and use method throttle() directly.

changes: Added horizontal alignment to useConnectedOverlay hook.
Redefined api for useConnectedOverlay to return an object
Added hook useLongPress to detect long presses on elements.
fixes: Change response from useConnectedOverlay to an object, instead of an array.

changes: Added reusable hook useFocusTrap to manage focus trapping.
Added method for checking server side rendering
Added reusable hook useConnectedOverlay to manage overlay positioning.
Removed default export of toolbox file, to make API surface and architecture more modular.
fixes: Import the tool you use directly, instead of using a default import. import toolbox from '@elvia/elvis-toolbox'; becomes import { throttle } from '@elvia/elvis-toolbox';

changes: Added a check if the variable window exists when checking if localhost in warnDeprecatedProps to make SSR work.
Changed the types of the deprecation function parameters to accommodate more functionality.
Added helper function to show deprecation warnings when deprecated props are used in components.
Updated dependencies.
